The creation of our great country go back more than two thousands years from today, and it take its name frome the number 4, a central figure our culture.

Flag Anthem Capital

Flag

Our flag represtents our country. Its ratio should be 1:2, however, any ratio is acceptable. Pumpkin Orange (#EB5D25), on the left, has the meaning of Traditions, Past, our country History and culture. Amethyst Purple, (#663695), on the right, shows technology, innovation, future, and the struggle for a better tommorow. Cyan Blue (#00AEEF), at the bottom, has the meaning of Security, Peace, Institutions, Union and Brotherhood. Finally, on the top, represents Justice, Purity, Freedom and Private Life

Tetrapolis

Tetrapolis the capital of our country was founded by Marco Polo in the same time as our country after a travel of 44 days, today it is the essential center of our country
with multiple big districts like the business one or the Catherinism district wich is an important religion inside our borders.
